texts.content: {"text":"1. (Bu) Allohdan va Uning Rasulidan mushriklarning siz ahdlashganlaringizga «baroat» — ora ochiqligi (e'loni)dir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,113]}]}

{"text":"2. Bas, yer yuzida to`rt oy sayr qilib yuringlar va bilinglarki, albatta, siz Allohni ojiz qoldiruvchi emassiz va, albatta, Alloh kofirlarni xor qilguvchidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,158]}]}

{"text":"3. (Bu) Alloh va Uning Rasulidan odamlarga «hajjul akbar» kunidagi bildirishdir. Albatta, Alloh va Uning Rasulining mushriklar bilan oralari ochiqdir. Bas, agar tavba qilsangiz, u o`zingiz uchun yaxshidir. Agar yuz o`girib ketadigan bo`lsangiz, bilinglarki, albatta, sizlar Allohni ojiz qoldiruvchi emassiz. Kufr keltirganlarga alamli azobning «bashoratini» beraver.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,366]}]}

{"text":"4. Magar mushriklardan siz ahdlashganingizdan keyin hech narsani nuqson qilmaganlari va sizga qarshi birovga yordam bermaganlarining ahdlarini muddatlarigacha batamom qiling. Albatta, Alloh taqvodorlarni sevadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,212]}]}

{"text":"5. Bas, harom oylar chiqqanda, mushriklarni qayerda topsangiz, o`ldiringlar, tutinglar, qamal qilinglar va ularni har joyda poylanglar. Agar tavba qilsalar, namozni to`kis ado etsalar va zakotni bersalar, yo`llariga qo`yib yuboringlar. Albatta, Alloh mag`firatli va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,281]}]}

{"text":"6. Agar mushriklardan birontasi panoh so`rasa, unga panoh ber, toki u, Allohning kalomini eshitsin. So`ngra, uni omonlik joyiga yetkazib qo`y. Bu, ularning bilmaydigan qavm bo`lganlari uchundir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,194]}]}

{"text":"7. Qanday qilib mushriklarga Allohning huzurida va Uning Rasulining huzurida ahd bo`lsin?! Magar siz bilan Masjidul Harom oldida ahdlashganlar, sizga nisbatan mudom mustaqiym tursalar, siz ham mustaqiym turing. Albatta, Alloh taqvodorlarni sevadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,248]}]}

{"text":"8. Qanday qilib (ularga ahd bo`lsinki), ular agar sizdan ustun kelsalar, na ahdga va na burchga rioya etmaslar. Sizni og`izlari bilan rozi qiladilar-u, qalblari ko`nmas. Ularning ko`plari fosiqlardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,200]}]}

{"text":"9. Ular Allohning oyatlarini ozgina bahoga sotib, Uning yo`lidan to`sdilar. Darhaqiqat, ularning qilganlari qanday ham yomon bo`ldi?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,133]}]}

{"text":"10. Ular mo`min haqida na ahdga va na burchga rioya qilmaslar. Ana o`shalar, o`zlari tajovuzkorlardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,102]}]}

{"text":"11. Bas, agar tavba qilsalar, namozni to`kis ado etsalar va zakotni bersalar, din qardoshingizdirlar. Biladigan qavm uchun oyatlarimizni batafsil bayon qilamiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,160]}]}

{"text":"12. Agar ahd berganlaridan keyin ahdlarini buzsalar va diningizga ta'na toshini otsalar, kufrboshilarga qarshi jang qiling! Zero, ularning ahdlari yo`qdir. Shoyadki, to`xtasalar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,178]}]}

{"text":"13. Ahdlarini buzgan, Rasulni (yurtdan) chiqarishga qasd qilgan va sizga (qarshi) birinchi bo`lib (urush) boshlagan qavm bilan urushmaysizmi?! Ulardan qo`rqasizmi?! Agar mo`min bo`lsangiz, qo`rqishingizga loyiq zot Allohdir!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,224]}]}

{"text":"14. Ularga qarshi jang qilinglar! Alloh ularni sizning qo`lingiz bilan azoblaydir, xorlaydir va ularga qarshi sizga yordam beradir. Va mo`min qavmlarning ko`ngillariga shifo beradir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,182]}]}

{"text":"15. Va qalblaridagi achchiqni ketkazadir. Alloh kimni xohlasa, o`shaning tavbasini qabul qiladir. Alloh bilguvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,133]}]}

{"text":"16. Sizdan jihod qilganlarni, Allohdan, Uning Rasulidan va mo`minlardan o`zgani do`st tutmaganlarni bilmay turib, Alloh tomonidan tark etib qo`yilmog`ingizni o`yladingizmi? Alloh nima qilayotganlaringizdan xabardor Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,222]}]}

{"text":"17. Mushriklarga, o`zlarining kofir ekanliklariga guvoh bo`lgan hollarida, Allohning masjidlarini obod qilishlari joiz emas. Ana o`shalar amallari habata bo`lganlardir va ular do`zaxda abadiy qoluvchilardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,207]}]}

{"text":"18. Albatta, Allohning masjidlarini faqat Allohga va oxirat kuniga iymon keltirganlar, namozni to`kis ado etganlar, zakotni berganlar va Allohdan boshqadan qo`rqmaganlargina obod qilurlar. Ajab emaski, ana o`shalar hidoyat topguvchilardan bo`lsalar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,249]}]}

{"text":"19. Hojilarga suv berishni va Masjidul Haromni obod qilishni Allohga, oxirat kuniga iymon keltirgan va Allohning yo`lida jihod qilgan kabi qildingizmi?! Ular Allohning huzurida teng emaslar. Alloh zolim qavmlarni hidoyat qilmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,228]}]}

{"text":"20. Iymon keltirib, hijrat qilganlar va Allohning yo`lida mollari va jonlari bilan jiddu jahd qilganlarning darajalari Allohning huzurida juda ulug`dir. Ana o`shalar yutuqqa erishuvchilardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,191]}]}

{"text":"21. Robbilari ularga O`z tarafidan bo`lgan rahmat, rozilik va ichida ularga atalgan doimiy ne'matlar bor jannatlarning bashoratini beradir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,139]}]}

{"text":"22. Ular unda abadiy qoluvchilardir. Albatta, Alloh — huzurida ulug` ajr bor Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,84]}]}

{"text":"23. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Agar kufrni iymondan ustun ko`rsalar, ota-onangiz va aka-ukalaringizni do`st tutmang. Sizdan kim ularni do`st tutsa, bas, ana o`shalar, o`zlari zolimlardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,184]}]}

{"text":"24. «Agar ota-onalaringiz, bolalaringiz, aka-ukalaringiz, juftlaringiz, qarindosh-urug`laringiz, kasb qilgan mollaringiz, kasod bo`lishdan qo`rqqan tijoratlaringiz va xush ko`rgan maskanlaringiz sizga Allohdan, Uning Rasuli va Uning yo`lida jiddu jahd qilishdan mahbubroq bo`lsa, u holda, Alloh O`z amrini keltirguncha kutib turing. Alloh fosiq qavmni hidoyat qilmas», – deb ayt.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,379]}]}

{"text":"25. Batahqiq, Alloh sizlarga ko`p joylarda nusrat berdi. Hunayn kunida ham. O`shanda sizni ko`pligingiz mag`rur qilgan edi. Bas, sizga hech foyda bermadi va keng yer sizga torlik qilib qoldi. So`ngra, ortga qarab qochdingiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,224]}]}

{"text":"26. So`ngra, Alloh sokinligini Payg`ambariga va mo`minlarga tushirdi hamda siz ko`rmaydigan lashkarlarni tushirdi va kufr keltirganlarni azobladi. Ana o`sha, kofirlarning jazosidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,181]}]}

{"text":"27. So`ngra, o`shandan keyin Alloh O`zi xohlagan kishilarning tavbasini qabul qildi. Alloh mag`firatli va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,121]}]}

{"text":"28. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Albatta, mushriklar najasdirlar, bunga shubha yo`q, bu yillaridan keyin Masjidul Haromga yaqin kelmasinlar. Agar faqirlikdan qo`rqsangiz, Alloh, O`zi xohlasa, sizni tezda fazli ila boy qilib qo`yadir. Albatta, Alloh bilguvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,273]}]}

{"text":"29. Allohga va oxirat kuniga iymon keltirmaydiganlarga, Alloh va Uning Rasuli harom qilgan narsalarni harom deb bilmaydigan va haq dinga yurmaydigan kitob berilganlarga qarshi, to ular bo`yinsungan hollarida o`z qo`llari bilan «jizya» bermagunicha, jang qiling.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,261]}]}

{"text":"30. Yahudiylar: «Uzayr Allohning o`g`lidir», – dedilar. Nasorolar: «Masiyh Allohning o`g`lidir», – dedilar. Bu og`izlari bilan aytgan gaplaridir. Avvalgi kufr keltirganlarning gapiga o`xshaturlar. Alloh ularni la'natlasin. Qayon burilmoqdalar?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,244]}]}

{"text":"31. Ular Allohni qo`yib o`zlarining hibr va rohiblarini hamda Masiyh ibn Maryamni Robb tutdilar. Ular faqat bitta ilohdan boshqaga ibodat qilmaslikka amr qilingan edilar. Undan o`zga ibodatga sazovor zot yo`q. U zot ular shirk keltirayotgan narsadan pokdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,257]}]}

{"text":"32. Ular Allohning nurini og`izlari bilan o`chirmoqchi bo`lurlar. Alloh esa, garchi kofirlar yoqtirmasa ham, O`z nurini batamom qilishdan boshqa har narsadan bosh tortadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,172]}]}

{"text":"33. U, garchi mushriklar yoqtirmasa ham, O`z Rasulini hidoyat va haq din bilan uni hamma dindan ustun qilish uchun yuborgan Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,131]}]}

{"text":"34. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Albatta, hibr va rohiblarning ko`plari odamlarning mollarini botil yo`l bilan yerlar va Allohning yo`lidan to`sarlar. Oltin va kumushni xazinaga bosadigan, Allohning yo`lida sarflamaydiganlarga alamli azobning bashoratini beraver.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,258]}]}

{"text":"35. Bir kuni o`sha(oltin-kumush)larni jahannam o`tida qizitilur va peshonalari, yonboshlari hamda orqalariga bosilib: «Mana bu o`zingiz uchun to`plagan narsangiz, bas, endi to`plab yurgan narsangizni tatib ko`ring!» – deyilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,226]}]}

{"text":"36. Albatta, Allohning kitobida oylarning soni Allohning huzurida osmonlaru yerni yaratgan kuni o`n ikki oy qilib belgilangan. Ulardan to`rttasi (urush qilish) harom (oylar)dir. Mana shu to`g`ri dindir. U(oy)larda o`zingizga zulm qilmang. Mushriklarga qarshi jam bo`lib, ular sizga qarshi jam bo`lib urushayotgandek, urush qiling. Va bilingki, albatta, Alloh taqvodorlar bilandir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,380]}]}

{"text":"37. Albatta, «nasiyu» kufrda ziyoda bo`lishdan o`zga narsa emas. Bu bilan kufr keltirganlar zalolatga ketkazilurlar. Alloh harom qilgan narsaning adadiga moslash uchun uni bir yil halol qilurlar, bir yil harom qilurlar. Bas, bu bilan Alloh harom qilgan narsani halol qilurlar. Ularga amallarining yomonligi ziynatlandi. Alloh kofir qavmlarni hidoyat qilmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,357]}]}

{"text":"38. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Sizga nima bo`ldiki, Allohning yo`lida qo`zg`aling, deyilsa, yerga yopishib oldingiz. Yoki oxiratni qo`yib, dunyo hayotiga rozi bo`ldingizmi? Oxirat oldida bu dunyo hayoti juda oz-ku?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,212]}]}

{"text":"39. Agar qo`zg`almasangiz, sizni alamli azob bilan azoblaydir. O`rningizga boshqa qavmni keltiradir. Siz Unga zarar keltira olmassiz. Alloh har bir narsaga qodirdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,165]}]}

{"text":"40. Agar siz unga yordam bermasangiz, batahqiq, Alloh unga, kufr keltirganlar uni ikki kishining biri bo`lgan holida chiqarganlarida, nusrat berdi. Ular ikkovlon g`orda turganlarida, u sherigiga: «Xafa bo`lma, Alloh, albatta, biz bilan», dedi. Bas, Alloh uning ustidan O`z sokinligini nozil qildi va siz ko`rmagan lashkarlar bilan qo`lladi. Kufr keltirganlar kalimasini past qildi. Allohning kalimasi esa, o`zi yuqori. Alloh g`olib va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,451]}]}

{"text":"41. Yengil bo`lsa ham, og`ir bo`lsa ham, qo`zg`alingiz va Allohning yo`lida mollaringiz va jonlaringiz ila jiddu jahd qilingiz. Agar bilsangiz, shu ishingiz o`zingiz uchun yaxshidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,182]}]}

{"text":"42. Agar oson manfaat va yaqin safar bo`lganida, albatta, senga ergashar edilar. Lekin ularga masofa uzoq ko`rindi. Ular tezda Alloh nomi bilan qasam ichib: «Agar qodir bo`lganimizda, albatta, siz bilan chiqar edik», – derlar. Ular o`zlarini halok qilurlar. Holbuki, Alloh ular yolg`onchi ekanlarini albatta biladir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,316]}]}

{"text":"43. Alloh seni afv qildi. Nima uchun ularga, to senga rostgo`y bo`lganlar ravshan bo`lmay turib va yolg`onchilarni bilmasingdan turib, izn berding?","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,147]}]}

{"text":"44. Allohga va oxirat kuniga iymon keltirganlar sendan mollari va jonlari bilan jiddu jahd qilishdan qolishga izn so`ramaslar. Alloh taqvodorlarni bilguvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,164]}]}

{"text":"45. Albatta faqat Allohga va oxirat kuniga ishonmaydiganlar va qalblari shubhaga to`lganlargina sendan izn so`rarlar. Bas, ular shubhalarida ikkilanaveradilar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,159]}]}

{"text":"46. Agar chiqishni xohlaganlarida, unga tayyorgarlik ko`rar edilar. Lekin Alloh ularning harakatlanishlarini yoqtirmay tutib qoldi. Ularga: «O`tiruvchilar bilan o`tiringlar», dedi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,180]}]}

{"text":"47. Agar ular ichingizda chiqqanlarida ham sizga yomonlikdan boshqa narsani ziyoda qilmasdilar, tezlab orangizga fitna solishga urinardilar. Holbuki, ichingizda ularga quloq soluvchilar bor edi. Alloh zolimlarni bilguvchi Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,229]}]}

{"text":"48. Batahqiq, bundan avval ham, toki ular yoqtirmasalar-da, haq kelib, Allohning ishi ustun bo`lgunicha, fitna qo`zib, senga ishlarni ag`dar-to`ntar qilishar edi.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins-Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,162]}]}

{"text":"98. A'robiylardan qilgan infoqni ziyon deb biladigan va sizga balo-ofat kelishini kutib turadiganlari ham bor. Yomon balolari o`zlariga ursin! {"text":"100. Birinchi peshqadam muhojirlar va ansoriylar va ularga yaxshilik bilan ergashganlar. Alloh ulardan rozi bo`ldi, ular ham Allohdan rozi bo`ldilar. {"text":"بَرَآءَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,87]}]}

{"text":"فَسِيحُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَرْبَعَةَ أَشْهُرٍۢ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ غَيْرُ مُعْجِزِى ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخْزِى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,134]}]}

{"text":"وَأَذَٰنٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَجِّ ٱلْأَكْبَرِ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ۙ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ۚ فَإِن تُبْتُمْ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ غَيْرُ مُعْجِزِى ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,302]}]}

{"text":"إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَنقُصُوكُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَمْ يُظَٰهِرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ أَحَدًۭا فَأَتِمُّوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ عَهْدَهُمْ إِلَىٰ مُدَّتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,215]}]}

{"text":"فَإِذَا ٱنسَلَخَ ٱلْأَشْهُرُ ٱلْحُرُمُ فَٱقْتُلُوا۟ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ حَيْثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمْ وَخُذُوهُمْ وَٱحْصُرُوهُمْ وَٱقْعُدُوا۟ لَهُمْ كُلَّ مَرْصَدٍۢ ۚ فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَخَلُّوا۟ سَبِيلَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,276]}]}

{"text":"وَإِنْ أَحَدٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ٱسْتَجَارَكَ فَأَجِرْهُ حَتَّىٰ يَسْمَعَ كَلَٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ أَبْلِغْهُ مَأْمَنَهُۥ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَعْلَمُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,168]}]}

{"text":"كَيْفَ يَكُونُ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ عَهْدٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعِندَ رَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّمْ عِندَ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ ۖ فَمَا ٱسْتَقَٰمُوا۟ لَكُمْ فَٱسْتَقِيمُوا۟ لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,219]}]}

{"text":"كَيْفَ وَإِن يَظْهَرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ لَا يَرْقُبُوا۟ فِيكُمْ إِلًّۭا وَلَا ذِمَّةًۭ ۚ يُرْضُونَكُم بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتَأْبَىٰ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ فَٰسِقُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,162]}]}

{"text":"ٱشْتَرَوْا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنًۭا قَلِيلًۭا فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,121]}]}

{"text":"لَا يَرْقُبُونَ فِى مُؤْمِنٍ إِلًّۭا وَلَا ذِمَّةًۭ ۚ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُعْتَدُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,88]}]}

{"text":"وَإِن نَّكَثُوٓا۟ أَيْمَٰنَهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ عَهْدِهِمْ وَطَعَنُوا۟ فِى دِينِكُمْ فَقَٰتِلُوٓا۟ أَئِمَّةَ ٱلْكُفْرِ ۙ إِنَّهُمْ لَآ أَيْمَٰنَ لَهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَنتَهُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,171]}]}

{"text":"أَلَا تُقَٰتِلُونَ قَوْمًۭا نَّكَثُوٓا۟ أَيْمَٰنَهُمْ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِإِخْرَاجِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَهُم بَدَءُوكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۚ أَتَخْشَوْنَهُمْ ۚ فَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخْشَوْهُ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,199]}]}

{"text":"أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تُتْرَكُوا۟ وَلَمَّا يَعْلَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا رَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَلِيجَةًۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,212]}]}

{"text":"مَا كَانَ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ أَن يَعْمُرُوا۟ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ شَٰهِدِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِم بِٱلْكُفْرِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَٰلُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلنَّارِ هُمْ خَٰلِدُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,170]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّمَا يَعْمُرُ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ مَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ وَأَقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَى ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَلَمْ يَخْشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۖ فَعَسَىٰٓ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَن يَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,213]}]}

{"text":"۞ أَجَعَلْتُمْ سِقَايَةَ ٱلْحَآجِّ وَعِمَارَةَ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ كَمَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ وَجَٰهَدَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوُۥنَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,228]}]}

{"text":"ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَٰهَدُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,165]}]}

{"text":"يُبَشِّرُهُمْ رَبُّهُم بِرَحْمَةٍۢ مِّنْهُ وَرِضْوَٰنٍۢ وَجَنَّٰتٍۢ لَّهُمْ فِيهَا نَعِيمٌۭ مُّقِيمٌ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,100]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ ءَابَآءَكُمْ وَإِخْوَٰنَكُمْ أَوْلِيَآءَ إِنِ ٱسْتَحَبُّوا۟ ٱلْكُفْرَ عَلَى ٱلْإِيمَٰنِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُم مِّنكُمْ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,205]}]}

{"text":"قُلْ إِن كَانَ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ وَأَبْنَآؤُكُمْ وَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُكُمْ وَعَشِيرَتُكُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلٌ ٱقْتَرَفْتُمُوهَا وَتِجَٰرَةٌۭ تَخْشَوْنَ كَسَادَهَا وَمَسَٰكِنُ تَرْضَوْنَهَآ أَحَبَّ إِلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَجِهَادٍۢ فِى سَبِيلِهِۦ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَمْرِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَٰسِقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,356]}]}

{"text":"لَقَدْ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى مَوَاطِنَ كَثِيرَةٍۢ ۙ وَيَوْمَ حُنَيْنٍ ۙ إِذْ أَعْجَبَتْكُمْ كَثْرَتُكُمْ فَلَمْ تُغْنِ عَنكُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَضَاقَتْ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتْ ثُمَّ وَلَّيْتُم مُّدْبِرِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,213]}]}

{"text":"ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَنزَلَ جُنُودًۭا لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا وَعَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,176]}]}

{"text":"ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,92]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ نَجَسٌۭ فَلَا يَقْرَبُوا۟ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ بَعْدَ عَامِهِمْ هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ عَيْلَةًۭ فَسَوْفَ يُغْنِيكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦٓ إِن شَآءَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,247]}]}

{"text":"قَٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ وَلَا يُحَرِّمُونَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَلَا يَدِينُونَ دِينَ ٱلْحَقِّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ حَتَّىٰ يُعْطُوا۟ ٱلْجِزْيَةَ عَن يَدٍۢ وَهُمْ صَٰغِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,252]}]}

{"text":"وَقَالَتِ ٱلْيَهُودُ عُزَيْرٌ ٱبْنُ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالَتِ ٱلنَّصَٰرَى ٱلْمَسِيحُ ٱبْنُ ٱللَّهِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ قَوْلُهُم بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ ۖ يُضَٰهِـُٔونَ قَوْلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ قَٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ أَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,224]}]}

{"text":"ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَحْبَارَهُمْ وَرُهْبَٰنَهُمْ أَرْبَابًۭا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَسِيحَ ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَٰهًۭا وَٰحِدًۭا ۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,223]}]}

{"text":"يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُطْفِـُٔوا۟ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَيَأْبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّآ أَن يُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,132]}]}

{"text":"هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,129]}]}

{"text":"۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْبَارِ وَٱلرُّهْبَانِ لَيَأْكُلُونَ أَمْوَٰلَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْبَٰطِلِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَكْنِزُونَ ٱلذَّهَبَ وَٱلْفِضَّةَ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَهَا فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,286]}]}

{"text":"يَوْمَ يُحْمَىٰ عَلَيْهَا فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ فَتُكْوَىٰ بِهَا جِبَاهُهُمْ وَجُنُوبُهُمْ وَظُهُورُهُمْ ۖ هَٰذَا مَا كَنَزْتُمْ لِأَنفُسِكُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْنِزُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,175]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّ عِدَّةَ ٱلشُّهُورِ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱثْنَا عَشَرَ شَهْرًۭا فِى كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ يَوْمَ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ مِنْهَآ أَرْبَعَةٌ حُرُمٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْقَيِّمُ ۚ فَلَا تَظْلِمُوا۟ فِيهِنَّ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۚ وَقَٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ كَآفَّةًۭ كَمَا يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمْ كَآفَّةًۭ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,344]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّسِىٓءُ زِيَادَةٌۭ فِى ٱلْكُفْرِ ۖ يُضَلُّ بِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُحِلُّونَهُۥ عَامًۭا وَيُحَرِّمُونَهُۥ عَامًۭا لِّيُوَاطِـُٔوا۟ عِدَّةَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ فَيُحِلُّوا۟ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ زُيِّنَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ أَعْمَٰلِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,292]}]}

{"text":"إِلَّا تَنفِرُوا۟ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا وَيَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ وَلَا تَضُرُّوهُ شَيْـًۭٔا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,152]}]}

{"text":"إِلَّا تَنصُرُوهُ فَقَدْ نَصَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِذْ أَخْرَجَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ثَانِىَ ٱثْنَيْنِ إِذْ هُمَا فِى ٱلْغَارِ إِذْ يَقُولُ لِصَٰحِبِهِۦ لَا تَحْزَنْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَنَا ۖ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ وَأَيَّدَهُۥ بِجُنُودٍۢ لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا وَجَعَلَ كَلِمَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلسُّفْلَىٰ ۗ وَكَلِمَةُ ٱللَّهِ هِىَ ٱلْعُلْيَا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,377]}]}

{"text":"ٱنفِرُوا۟ خِفَافًۭا وَثِقَالًۭا وَجَٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنفُسِكُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,146]}]}

{"text":"لَوْ كَانَ عَرَضًۭا قَرِيبًۭا وَسَفَرًۭا قَاصِدًۭا لَّٱتَّبَعُوكَ وَلَٰكِنۢ بَعُدَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلشُّقَّةُ ۚ وَسَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَوِ ٱسْتَطَعْنَا لَخَرَجْنَا مَعَكُمْ يُهْلِكُونَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَٰذِبُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,239]}]}

{"text":"عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَتَعْلَمَ ٱلْكَٰذِبِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,109]}]}

{"text":"لَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ أَن يُجَٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلْمُتَّقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,158]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّمَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ وَٱرْتَابَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فَهُمْ فِى رَيْبِهِمْ يَتَرَدَّدُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,145]}]}

{"text":"۞ وَلَوْ أَرَادُوا۟ ٱلْخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّوا۟ لَهُۥ عُدَّةًۭ وَلَٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمْ فَثَبَّطَهُمْ وَقِيلَ ٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْقَٰعِدِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,149]}]}

{"text":"لَوْ خَرَجُوا۟ فِيكُم مَّا زَادُوكُمْ إِلَّا خَبَالًۭا وَلَأَوْضَعُوا۟ خِلَٰلَكُمْ يَبْغُونَكُمُ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ وَفِيكُمْ سَمَّٰعُونَ لَهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,174]}]}

{"text":"لَقَدِ ٱبْتَغَوُا۟ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ مِن قَبْلُ وَقَلَّبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَهُمْ كَٰرِهُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,136]}]}

{"text":"قُلْ هَلْ تَرَبَّصُونَ بِنَآ إِلَّآ إِحْدَى ٱلْحُسْنَيَيْنِ ۖ وَنَحْنُ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمْ أَن يُصِيبَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابٍۢ مِّنْ عِندِهِۦٓ أَوْ بِأَيْدِينَا ۖ فَتَرَبَّصُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّتَرَبِّصُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,209]}]}

{"text":"قُلْ أَنفِقُوا۟ طَوْعًا أَوْ كَرْهًۭا لَّن يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُمْ ۖ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًۭا فَٰسِقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,102]}]}

{"text":"وَمَا مَنَعَهُمْ أَن تُقْبَلَ مِنْهُمْ نَفَقَٰتُهُمْ إِلَّآ أَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَبِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا يَأْتُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِلَّا وَهُمْ كُسَالَىٰ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ إِلَّا وَهُمْ كَٰرِهُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,199]}]}

{"text":"لَوْ يَجِدُونَ مَلْجَـًٔا أَوْ مَغَٰرَٰتٍ أَوْ مُدَّخَلًۭا لَّوَلَّوْا۟ إِلَيْهِ وَهُمْ يَجْمَحُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,99]}]}

{"text":"وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَلْمِزُكَ فِى ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِ فَإِنْ أُعْطُوا۟ مِنْهَا رَضُوا۟ وَإِن لَّمْ يُعْطَوْا۟ مِنْهَآ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْخَطُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,130]}]}

{"text":"۞ إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَٰتُ لِلْفُقَرَآءِ وَٱلْمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱلْعَٰمِلِينَ عَلَيْهَا وَٱلْمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلرِّقَابِ وَٱلْغَٰرِمِينَ وَفِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ ۖ فَرِيضَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,239]}]}

{"text":"وَمِنْهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ ٱلنَّبِىَّ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ أُذُنٌۭ ۚ قُلْ أُذُنُ خَيْرٍۢ لَّكُمْ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَيُؤْمِنُ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,250]}]}

{"text":"أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدًۭا فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخِزْىُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,141]}]}

{"text":"كَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ أَشَدَّ مِنكُمْ قُوَّةًۭ وَأَكْثَرَ أَمْوَٰلًۭا وَأَوْلَٰدًۭا فَٱسْتَمْتَعُوا۟ بِخَلَٰقِهِمْ فَٱسْتَمْتَعْتُم بِخَلَٰقِكُمْ كَمَا ٱسْتَمْتَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُم بِخَلَٰقِهِمْ وَخُضْتُمْ كَٱلَّذِى خَاضُوٓا۟ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَٰلُهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۖ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰسِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,351]}]}

{"text":"أَلَمْ يَأْتِهِمْ نَبَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ قَوْمِ نُوحٍۢ وَعَادٍۢ وَثَمُودَ وَقَوْمِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَأَصْحَٰبِ مَدْيَنَ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَٰتِ ۚ أَتَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَٰتِ ۖ فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظْلِمَهُمْ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,263]}]}

{"text":"وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتُ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ يَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَيُطِيعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ سَيَرْحَمُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,278]}]}

{"text":"وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةًۭ فِى جَنَّٰتِ عَدْنٍۢ ۚ وَرِضْوَٰنٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,227]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَٱلْمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱغْلُظْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,131]}]}

{"text":"يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ مَا قَالُوا۟ وَلَقَدْ قَالُوا۟ كَلِمَةَ ٱلْكُفْرِ وَكَفَرُوا۟ بَعْدَ إِسْلَٰمِهِمْ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِمَا لَمْ يَنَالُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا نَقَمُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ أَنْ أَغْنَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ ۚ فَإِن يَتُوبُوا۟ يَكُ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَتَوَلَّوْا۟ يُعَذِّبْهُمُ ٱللَّهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۚ وَمَا لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍۢ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,408]}]}

{"text":"۞ وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ عَٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَئِنْ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضْلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,115]}]}

{"text":"فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ بَخِلُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,84]}]}

{"text":"فَأَعْقَبَهُمْ نِفَاقًۭا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يَلْقَوْنَهُۥ بِمَآ أَخْلَفُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ وَبِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,138]}]}

{"text":"أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّهُمْ وَنَجْوَىٰهُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,103]}]}

{"text":"ٱلَّذِينَ يَلْمِزُونَ ٱلْمُطَّوِّعِينَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ فِى ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ إِلَّا جُهْدَهُمْ فَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنْهُمْ ۙ سَخِرَ ٱللَّهُ مِنْهُمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,193]}]}

{"text":"ٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ أَوْ لَا تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ إِن تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ سَبْعِينَ مَرَّةًۭ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَٰسِقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,223]}]}

{"text":"فَرِحَ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ بِمَقْعَدِهِمْ خِلَٰفَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَرِهُوٓا۟ أَن يُجَٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَنفِرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْحَرِّ ۗ قُلْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ أَشَدُّ حَرًّۭا ۚ لَّوْ كَانُوا۟ يَفْقَهُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,248]}]}

{"text":"فَلْيَضْحَكُوا۟ قَلِيلًۭا وَلْيَبْكُوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,86]}]}

{"text":"فَإِن رَّجَعَكَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَىٰ طَآئِفَةٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ فَٱسْتَـْٔذَنُوكَ لِلْخُرُوجِ فَقُل لَّن تَخْرُجُوا۟ مَعِىَ أَبَدًۭا وَلَن تُقَٰتِلُوا۟ مَعِىَ عَدُوًّا ۖ إِنَّكُمْ رَضِيتُم بِٱلْقُعُودِ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ فَٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَٰلِفِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,239]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنْهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدًۭا وَلَا تَقُمْ عَلَىٰ قَبْرِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ فَٰسِقُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,159]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا تُعْجِبْكَ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَأَوْلَٰدُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَتَزْهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَهُمْ كَٰفِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,152]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ أَنْ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَٰهِدُوا۟ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ ٱسْتَـْٔذَنَكَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلطَّوْلِ مِنْهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ ذَرْنَا نَكُن مَّعَ ٱلْقَٰعِدِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,169]}]}

{"text":"رَضُوا۟ بِأَن يَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,93]}]}

{"text":"لَٰكِنِ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ جَٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,164]}]}

{"text":"أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,116]}]}

{"text":"وَجَآءَ ٱلْمُعَذِّرُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ لِيُؤْذَنَ لَهُمْ وَقَعَدَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ سَيُصِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,168]}]}

{"text":"لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلضُّعَفَآءِ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرْضَىٰ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ مَا يُنفِقُونَ حَرَجٌ إِذَا نَصَحُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ مَا عَلَى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ مِن سَبِيلٍۢ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,217]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا مَآ أَتَوْكَ لِتَحْمِلَهُمْ قُلْتَ لَآ أَجِدُ مَآ أَحْمِلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ تَوَلَّوا۟ وَّأَعْيُنُهُمْ تَفِيضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمْعِ حَزَنًا أَلَّا يَجِدُوا۟ مَا يُنفِقُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,192]}]}

{"text":"۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱشْتَرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلَهُم بِأَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۚ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقْتُلُونَ وَيُقْتَلُونَ ۖ وَعْدًا عَلَيْهِ حَقًّۭا فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ وَٱلْإِنجِيلِ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِعَهْدِهِۦ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَٱسْتَبْشِرُوا۟ بِبَيْعِكُمُ ٱلَّذِى بَايَعْتُم بِهِۦ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,373]}]}

{"text":"ٱلتَّٰٓئِبُونَ ٱلْعَٰبِدُونَ ٱلْحَٰمِدُونَ ٱلسَّٰٓئِحُونَ ٱلرَّٰكِعُونَ ٱلسَّٰجِدُونَ ٱلْءَامِرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَٱلنَّاهُونَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَٱلْحَٰفِظُونَ لِحُدُودِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,205]}]}

{"text":"مَا كَانَ لِلنَّبِىِّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن يَسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَلَوْ كَانُوٓا۟ أُو۟لِى قُرْبَىٰ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمْ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,179]}]}

{"text":"وَمَا كَانَ ٱسْتِغْفَارُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ إِلَّا عَن مَّوْعِدَةٍۢ وَعَدَهَآ إِيَّاهُ فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥٓ أَنَّهُۥ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنْهُ ۚ إِنَّ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لَأَوَّٰهٌ حَلِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,202]}]}

{"text":"وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَوْمًۢا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَىٰهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَهُم مَّا يَتَّقُونَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,140]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۚ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍۢ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,133]}]}

{"text":"لَّقَد تَّابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِىِّ وَٱلْمُهَٰجِرِينَ وَٱلْأَنصَارِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ فِى سَاعَةِ ٱلْعُسْرَةِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا كَادَ يَزِيغُ قُلُوبُ فَرِيقٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِهِمْ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,233]}]}

{"text":"وَعَلَى ٱلثَّلَٰثَةِ ٱلَّذِينَ خُلِّفُوا۟ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ضَاقَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتْ وَضَاقَتْ عَلَيْهِمْ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَن لَّا مَلْجَأَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّآ إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَتُوبُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,274]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,81]}]}

{"text":"مَا كَانَ لِأَهْلِ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ أَن يَتَخَلَّفُوا۟ عَن رَّسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَرْغَبُوا۟ بِأَنفُسِهِمْ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ لَا يُصِيبُهُمْ ظَمَأٌۭ وَلَا نَصَبٌۭ وَلَا مَخْمَصَةٌۭ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَطَـُٔونَ مَوْطِئًۭا يَغِيظُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَلَا يَنَالُونَ مِنْ عَدُوٍّۢ نَّيْلًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عَمَلٌۭ صَٰلِحٌ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,432]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ نَفَقَةًۭ صَغِيرَةًۭ وَلَا كَبِيرَةًۭ وَلَا يَقْطَعُونَ وَادِيًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُمْ لِيَجْزِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,159]}]}

{"text":"۞ وَمَا كَانَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ لِيَنفِرُوا۟ كَآفَّةًۭ ۚ فَلَوْلَا نَفَرَ مِن كُلِّ فِرْقَةٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ طَآئِفَةٌۭ لِّيَتَفَقَّهُوا۟ فِى ٱلدِّينِ وَلِيُنذِرُوا۟ قَوْمَهُمْ إِذَا رَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَحْذَرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,222]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ وَلْيَجِدُوا۟ فِيكُمْ غِلْظَةًۭ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,164]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ فَمِنْهُم مَّن يَقُولُ أَيُّكُمْ زَادَتْهُ هَٰذِهِۦٓ إِيمَٰنًۭا ۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَزَادَتْهُمْ إِيمَٰنًۭا وَهُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,175]}]}

{"text":"وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَتْهُمْ رِجْسًا إِلَىٰ رِجْسِهِمْ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كَٰفِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,111]}]}

{"text":"أَوَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّهُمْ يُفْتَنُونَ فِى كُلِّ عَامٍۢ مَّرَّةً أَوْ مَرَّتَيْنِ ثُمَّ لَا يَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,127]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ نَّظَرَ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ هَلْ يَرَىٰكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱنصَرَفُوا۟ ۚ صَرَفَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,176]}]}

{"text":"لَقَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولٌۭ مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ عَزِيزٌ عَلَيْهِ مَا عَنِتُّمْ حَرِيصٌ عَلَيْكُم بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,129]}]}

{"text":"فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.82745099067687988,0.60392159223556519]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,125]}]}
